data.title: Gazette Journalists and Reporters with Contacts
data.meta_description: Here is the list of top Pittsburgh Post-Gazette Journalists and Reporters with their contact information and social media links.
data.meta_site_name: FeedSpot for Journalists, Editors and Reporters
data.text:
1. Ciara Mceneany

Designation Business Reporter Author Bio journalist. NY, VT, PGH. ???? ****@post-gazette.com ✉️

Gender Female Twitter @CiaraM4260 LinkedIn Profile Link Facebook Profile Link

Designation Associate Sports Editor, Multimedia Author Bio ASE/Multimedia, @PittsburghPG. All things Steelers, Penguins, Pirates, Pitt and Penn State.

Designation Books Editor Author Bio critic, writer, columnist; edits @PittsburghPG InReview; won PEN/Fusion; lost Jeopardy!; ❤️s Steelers, Eurovision, fút, the RGV; rebelde con causa ????????????????????????

Twitter @zadri

Designation Sports Writer Author Bio @PittsburghPG Penguins & Pirates reporter | From the Bay, living in PA | Previously @PSUCommRadio, @DailyCollegian, @WPSU, @scsentinel

Designation Associate Features Editor Author Bio Interim editor @ThePUPNews. Soon I'll get back to work documenting Pittsburgh beer and other cool aspects of W. Pa./Ohio Valley life. It's all interim, right?

Twitter @brandonmcg (4.8K Followers)

15. Brian Batko

Designation Steelers Beat Writer Author Bio Covering Steelers @PGSportsNow. Dad of Dawson and Blair. Chelsea fan. Born on the same day as Young Thug, so I can never be old. Leave a tender moment alone.

Twitter @BrianBatko

Designation Pitt Sports Reporter Author Bio Alum: Pitt Law & Cheyney University / Writer: #Pitt, @PittsburghPG / Host: Locked on #Steelers/#NFL podcasts / Co-host @11Skylights. Black Lives Matter.
